Steps.name: Symantec Email.Cloud >Urgent: Details
Steps.preCreateMessage: Creating demo record for Symantec Email Cloud.
Steps.postCreateMessage: Demo record for Symantec Email Cloud has been created.

title: Symantec Email Cloud
description:
The scenario creates a demo records for phishing emails reported by Symantec Email Cloud
Navigate to the generated alert and observe the following:
* Reported Email contains file information like malware name, filename, malware category, file hash etc.
* Reported Information (sender, email message) is presented for analyzing the case.
